description:
“We thought we were going to die there. We didn’t think anybody was going to come back for us.”

The post Hurricane-Struck North Carolina Prisoners Were Locked in Cells With Their Own Feces for Nearly a Week appeared first on The Intercept.
title: Hurricane-Struck North Carolina Prisoners Were Locked in Cells With Their Own Feces for Nearly a Week

description:
For most impacted communities, the cruelty of the system has long been a constant regardless of which party controls the White House.

title: Kamala Harris Once Sought to Reform Mass Incarceration. Does That Matter to Prison Families?

description:

title: Instead of Calling Out “Human Shields,” U.S. Media Says Israel’s Intel HQ Is In “Densely Populated Area”
